lines.text: We're learning a lot of interesting stuff at school, but I can't wait to become a Trainer.
The next best thing is the summer activities with the Rangers!
I need to return home, or I'm going to miss "My Little Ponyta"!
And then my friends are going to spoil it before I can watch a rerun...
Today Cody from school got his Pok√© Ball taken away by the teacher.
He kept playing with it and bothering everyone.
